title: Add Command
objective: Learn how to define commands using Electronic Data Sheets and how to define and dispatch a command handler function.

exercise.instructions:
1. Locate the '<DataTypeSet>' element.
2. Within this element create a new 'ContainerDataType':
    Named 'SetParamCmd_Payload'
    EntryList entry named 'Param' with type 'BASE_TYPES/uint16'

Note BASE_TYPES is defined in cfe/modules/core_api/eds/base_types.xml

1. Locate the 'ResetCountersCmd' ContainerDataType.
2. After this entry create a new 'ContainerDataType':
    Named 'SetParamCmd'
    FunctionCode value of '2'
    EntryList entry named 'Payload' with type 'SetParamCmd_Payload'

Note the GUI needs to be retarted after building the new lesson cFS target.

1. At the end of the event message identify list add:
    #define @TEMPLATE@_CMD_SET_PARAM_INF_EID 8

Note this is the event ID for the event message send when the command is processed.

1. In function @TEMPLATE@_ProcessGroundCommand() after the case statement for @TEMPLATE@_RESET_COUNTERS_CC add
    The @TEMPLATE@_SET_PARAM_CC case statement code from the exercise window

1. After the case statement for @TEMPLATE@_RESET_COUNTERS_CC add
    The @TEMPLATE@_SetParam() code from the exercise window
